keepfocus.title: What is KeepFocus?
keepfocus.subtitle: KeepFocus is a modern Pomodoro timer and task management app that runs entirely in your browser. Built with privacy in mind, it helps you focus using the proven Pomodoro technique.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: Your privacy is our priority. This policy explains how KeepFocus handles your data with complete transparency.

summary.title: Privacy Summary
points: All data stored locally in your browser - never uploaded to servers
No user accounts, email addresses, or personal information collected
No analytics, tracking, or behavioral monitoring
No cookies used for tracking purposes
Complete transparency with open source code

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.content: KeepFocus is part of Switch-to.eu, a European initiative building privacy-first digital tools. We're committed to creating productivity software that respects your privacy and operates under European data protection standards.

dataCollection.title: What Data We Collect
dataCollection.subtitle: KeepFocus is designed to collect minimal data necessary to provide its core functionality:

taskData.title: Task Information
taskData.description: Task titles, descriptions, completion status, and pomodoro counts you create - stored only in your browser's local storage

settingsData.title: Settings & Preferences
settingsData.description: Timer durations, notification preferences, and other customization options - stored locally in your browser

technicalData.title: Technical Information
technicalData.description: Basic server logs for security and performance monitoring (no personal identification or tracking)

noData.title: What We Don't Collect
noData.description: No email addresses, no IP tracking, no behavioral analytics, no advertising profiles, no tracking cookies, no cloud synchronization data

localStorage.title: Local Storage Only
localStorage.description: All your tasks, settings, and timer data are stored exclusively in your browser's local storage. This data never leaves your device or gets transmitted to our servers.

clientSide.title: Client-Side Processing
clientSide.description: All pomodoro timer functionality, task management, and data processing happens entirely in your browser. No server-side processing of personal data.

europeanServers.title: European Infrastructure
europeanServers.description: (For hosting only) App hosting uses European servers under strict European data protection laws. No personal data is stored on servers.

security.title: Technical Security
security.description: HTTPS encryption, secure hosting infrastructure, regular security updates, and open source transparency for code auditing.

automatic.title: Automatic Data Management
automatic.description: Your tasks and settings persist in your browser's local storage until you manually delete them or clear your browser data.

immediate.title: Immediate Control
immediate.description: You can delete all your data instantly by clearing your browser's local storage or using your browser's data management features.

logs.title: Server Logs
logs.description: Basic server access logs (no personal data) are retained for 30 days for security monitoring and performance optimization.

hosting.title: Hosting Infrastructure
hosting.description: We use European hosting providers that comply with GDPR and EU data protection standards. No personal data is shared with hosting providers.

noTracking.title: No Analytics or Tracking
noTracking.description: We don't use Google Analytics, Facebook tracking, or any other third-party analytics services. No behavioral data is collected or shared.

notifications.title: Browser Notifications
notifications.description: Desktop notifications use your browser's native notification API. No data is sent to third parties for notification delivery.

openSource.title: Open Source Transparency
openSource.description: Our code is publicly available for inspection. You can verify that no hidden tracking or data collection occurs.

access.title: Right to Access
access.description: You can access all your data at any time through your browser's developer tools or by inspecting local storage.

deletion.title: Right to Deletion
deletion.description: Delete all your data instantly by clearing your browser's local storage or using the browser's built-in data management features.

portability.title: Data Portability
portability.description: Export your tasks and settings data from your browser's local storage at any time using standard browser tools.

noConsent.title: No Consent Required
noConsent.description: Since no personal data is collected or processed server-side, explicit consent mechanisms are not required for basic app functionality.

noTransfers.title: No Data Transfers
noTransfers.description: Since all personal data stays in your browser, there are no international data transfers. App hosting occurs within European Union jurisdiction.

privacy.title: Privacy Questions
privacy.description: For privacy-related questions or concerns, contact us through our main website at Switch-to.eu or open an issue on our GitHub repository.

authority.title: Data Protection Authority
authority.description: If you have concerns about our privacy practices, you can contact your local European data protection authority, though note that minimal data processing occurs.

notification.title: Change Notifications
notification.description: Significant privacy policy changes will be announced on our website and GitHub repository. Check this page periodically for updates.

consent.title: Continued Use
consent.description: Continued use of KeepFocus after privacy policy updates constitutes acceptance of the changes.
